title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving further
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Central
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Central 

Securities Depositories) (CSD Nominee) Regulations 2021. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on the 12th day of March
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited european union (central security depositories) (csd nominee) regulation 2021 (2) regulation shall come operation 12th day march

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving further
Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving further
heading: 2. (1) In these Regulations –
text_raw:
2. (1) In these Regulations – 

“central securities depository” means a central securities depository within the 
meaning of the CSD Regulation that is authorised to perform services in the 
State; 

“CSD Regulation” means Regulation (EU) No 909/2014 of the European 
Parliament and of the Council of 23 July 20141 on improving securities 
settlement in the European Union and on central securities depositories and 
amending Directives 98/26/EC and 2014/65/EU and Regulation (EU) No 
236/2012; 

“CSD nominee” means such body or bodies corporate as from time to time 
may be nominated by a central securities depository to hold relevant securities 
represented in the depository’s securities settlement system; 

“relevant issuer” means a public limited company that has issued securities that 
are relevant securities; 

“relevant securities” means securities that are issued by a relevant issuer and 
registered in the name of a central securities depository. 

(2) A word or expression which is used in these Regulations and is also 
used in the CSD Regulation has, unless the context otherwise requires, the 
same meaning in these Regulations as it has in the CSD Regulation.
text_norm: 2 (1) regulation - central security depository mean central security depository within meaning csd regulation authorised perform service state csd regulation mean regulation (eu) 909 2014 european parliament council 23 july 20141 improving security settlement european union central security depository amending directive 98 26 ec 2014 65 eu regulation (eu) 236 2012 csd nominee mean body body corporate time time may nominated central security depository hold relevant security represented depository security settlement system relevant issuer mean public limited company issued security relevant security relevant security mean security issued relevant issuer registered name central security depository (2) word expression used regulation also used csd regulation unless context otherwise requires meaning regulation csd regulation

title: Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the purpose of giving further
heading: 3. For the purposes of Chapter 7A of Part 17 of the Companies Act of
text_raw:
3. For the purposes of Chapter 7A of Part 17 of the Companies Act of 
2014 (No. 38 of 2014), “relevant securities” shall include securities registered 
in the name of a CSD nominee. 

1 OJ L 257, 28.8.2014, p. 1. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 16th March, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [110] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

12 March, 2021. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment.
